details: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language, including variables, loops, functions, and memory management.
Explore the basics of algorithm design and analysis, covering sorting, searching, and data structures.
Introduces C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms for competitive programming.
Learn about fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.
Get started with object-oriented programming (OOP) using Python and learn about classes and inheritance.
Explore software development methodologies, project management, and best practices.
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
Learn the basics of database management using MySQL, including SQL queries and database design.
Develop your problem-solving skills and algorithmic thinking to tackle complex programming challenges.
